name: Charmander

attacks.name: Fire Fang
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

flavorText: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.

name: Charmeleon

abilities.name: Burning Fighter
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Fire Energy cards, attach them to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

flavorText: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the air temperature to unbearably high levels.

name: Charizard

abilities.name: Resolute Flame
abilities.text: This Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon for each of their Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX in play.

attacks.name: Fiery Blast
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

flavorText: Its wings can carry this Pokémon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.

name: Torchic

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

flavorText: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Combusken

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.text: Whenever you attach an Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon, remove all Special Conditions from it.

attacks.name: Lunge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

flavorText: During a battle, the hot flame in its body increases. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.

name: Blaziken

abilities.name: Firestarter
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fire Stream
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

flavorText: When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over buildings.

name: Victini ◇
rules: ◇ (Prism Star) Rule: You can't have more than 1 ◇ card with the same name in your deck. If a ◇ card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.

attacks.name: Infinity
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each basic Energy card in your discard pile. Then, shuffle those cards into your deck.

flavorText: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being's entire body will be overflowing with power.

name: Darumaka

attacks.name: Damage Rush
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

flavorText: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Darmanitan

attacks.name: Heat Assist
attacks.text: Attach up to 3 Fire Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Darmani-Hands
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 more damage for each heads.

flavorText: Its internal fire burns at 2,500 degrees Fahrenheit, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.

name: Heatmor

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Charring Breath
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon isn't Burned, this attack does nothing.

flavorText: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.

name: Reshiram-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Flame Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Scorching Column
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Vermilion-GX
attacks.text: You may attach up to 5 Fire Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Litten

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

flavorText: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.

name: Salandit

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

flavorText: Volcanoes or dry, craggy places are its home. It emanates a sweet-smelling poisonous gas that attracts bug Pokémon, then attacks them.

name: Salazzle

attacks.name: Ring of Fire
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned. It can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

flavorText: Filled with pheromones, its poisonous gas can be diluted to use in the production of luscious perfumes.

name: Horsea

attacks.name: Splatter
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

flavorText: It makes its nest in the shade of corals. If it senses danger, it spits murky ink and flees.

name: Horsea

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

flavorText: It makes its nest in the shade of corals. If it senses danger, it spits murky ink and flees.

name: Seadra

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

flavorText: It is capable of swimming backwards by rapidly flapping its winglike pectoral fins and stout tail.

name: Kingdra-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Reverse Thrust
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Maelstrom-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Magikarp

attacks.name: Water Splash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

flavorText: Its reckless leaps make it easy pickings for predators. On the bright side, many Pokémon enjoy longer life spans, thanks to Magikarp.

name: Gyarados

abilities.name: Commotion
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Wild Tail
attacks.text: You may discard any Stadium card in play.

flavorText: There are people who swear that any place Gyarados appears is fated for destruction.

name: Lapras

attacks.name: Aqua Bullet
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

flavorText: These Pokémon were once near extinction due to poaching. Following protective regulations, there is now an overabundance of them.

name: Totodile

attacks.name: Leer
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

flavorText: Its powerful, well-developed jaws are capable of crushing anything. Even its Trainer must be careful.

name: Croconaw

attacks.name: Sweep Away
attacks.text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

flavorText: Once it bites down, it won't let go until it loses its fangs. New fangs quickly grow into place.

name: Feraligatr

abilities.name: Downpour
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Water Energy card from your hand.

attacks.name: Riptide
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Water Energy card in your discard pile. Then, shuffle those cards into your deck.

flavorText: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.

name: Wooper
flavorText: When the temperature cools in the evening, they emerge from water to seek food along the shore.

name: Quagsire

abilities.name: Wash Out
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Water Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

flavorText: This carefree Pokémon has an easygoing nature. While swimming, it always bumps into boat hulls.

name: Corsola

attacks.name: Bubble Shoot
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

flavorText: Pursued by Mareanie for the branches on its head, this Pokémon will sometimes snap its own branches off as a diversion while it escapes.

name: Feebas

abilities.name: Submerge
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).

flavorText: Although unattractive and unpopular, this Pokémon's marvelous vitality has made it a subject of research.

name: Milotic

attacks.name: Aurora Wave
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Aqua Split
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

flavorText: It lives at the bottom of clear lakes. In times of war, it shows itself, which soothes people's minds and hearts.

name: Phione

abilities.name: Murmurs of the Sea
abilities.text: Your Water Pokémon can't be Confused. If those Pokémon are already Confused, remove that Special Condition.

attacks.name: Water Pulse
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

flavorText: It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.

name: Wishiwashi

abilities.name: Meet Up
abilities.text: Your Wishiwashi-GX in play get +20 HP, and their attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

flavorText: It's awfully weak and notably tasty, so everyone is always out to get it. As it happens, anyone trying to bully it receives a painful lesson.

name: Trapinch

attacks.name: Mini Earthquake
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

flavorText: As it digs through the sand, its giant jaws crush any rocks that obstruct its path. It builds a funnel-shaped nest.

name: Hydreigon

abilities.name: Weed Out
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose 3 of your Benched Pokémon. Then, discard your other Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dark Destruction
attacks.text: You may discard an Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

flavorText: The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.

name: Dratini

attacks.name: Wrap
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

flavorText: After a 10-hour struggle, a fisherman was able to pull one up and confirm its existence.

name: Dratini
flavorText: After a 10-hour struggle, a fisherman was able to pull one up and confirm its existence.

name: Dragonair

attacks.name: Dragon Tail
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 60 damage for each heads.

flavorText: From time immemorial, it has been venerated by agricultural peoples as an entity able to control the weather.

name: Dragonite-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Giga Impact
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Dragonporter-GX
attacks.text: Put 3 Dragon Pokémon from your discard pile onto your Bench. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Vibrava

attacks.name: Sonic Edge
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

flavorText: To help make its wings grow, it dissolves quantities of prey in its digestive juices and guzzles them down every day.

name: Flygon

abilities.name: Dragon Guard
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, except damage, done to your Dragon Pokémon. (Existing effects are not removed.)

attacks.name: Sand Tomb
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

flavorText: This Pokémon hides in the heart of sandstorms it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.

name: Altaria

abilities.name: Fight Song
abilities.text: Your Dragon Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

flavorText: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.

name: Altaria

abilities.name: Fight Song
abilities.text: Your Dragon Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

flavorText: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.

name: Altaria-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Bright Tone
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX.

attacks.name: Sonic Edge
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Euphoria-GX
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep. Heal all damage from all of your Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Bagon

attacks.name: Risky Kick
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Dragon Eye
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

flavorText: With its steel-hard stone head, it headbutts indiscriminately. This is because of the stress it feels at being unable to fly.

name: Shelgon

abilities.name: Energy Guard
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has any basic Energy attached to it, it takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

flavorText: They lurk deep within caves—motionless, neither eating nor drinking. Why they don't die is not known.

name: Salamence-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Dragon Lift
abilities.text: Your Pokémon in play have no Retreat Cost, except Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX.

attacks.name: Bright Flame
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flame Jet-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Druddigon

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

flavorText: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.

name: Zekrom

attacks.name: Shred
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bolt Strike
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon does 50 damage to itself.

flavorText: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.

name: Kyurem

attacks.name: Outrage
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Frost Spear
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

flavorText: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.

name: White Kyurem-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Shred
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Raging Blade
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Dragon Nova-GX
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned and Paralyzed. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Zygarde

attacks.name: Rumble
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Raging Blade
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 60 more damage.

flavorText: It's thought to be monitoring the ecosystem. There are rumors that even greater power lies hidden within it.

name: Turtonator

attacks.name: Explosive Jet
attacks.text: Discard any amount of Fire Energy from your Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

flavorText: It gushes fire and poisonous gases from its nostrils. Its dung is an explosive substance and can be put to various uses.

name: Drampa

attacks.name: Dragon Wisdom
attacks.text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Dragon Pokémon.

flavorText: This Pokémon is friendly to people and loves children most of all. It comes from deep in the mountains to play with children it likes in town.

name: Jangmo-o

attacks.name: Rigidify
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

flavorText: They live in mountains where no trace of humans can be detected. Jangmo-o grow little by little as they battle one another.

name: Hakamo-o

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

flavorText: It sheds and regrows its scales on a continuous basis. The scales become harder and sharper each time they're regrown.

name: Kommo-o

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Raging Uppercut
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has 8 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 120 more damage.

flavorText: Its rigid scales function as offense and defense. In the past, its scales were processed and used to make weapons and other commodities.

name: Kangaskhan

attacks.name: Fetch
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: One-Two Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

flavorText: The child in its pouch leaves home after roughly three years. That is the only time the mother is heard to cry wildly.

name: Swablu

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

flavorText: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.

name: Swablu

attacks.name: Sing
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

flavorText: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.

name: Reshiram-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Flame Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Scorching Column
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Vermilion-GX
attacks.text: You may attach up to 5 Fire Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Kingdra-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Reverse Thrust
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Maelstrom-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Giga Impact
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Dragonporter-GX
attacks.text: Put 3 Dragon Pokémon from your discard pile onto your Bench. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Altaria-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Bright Tone
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX.

attacks.name: Sonic Edge
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Euphoria-GX
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep. Heal all damage from all of your Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Reshiram-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Flame Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Scorching Column
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Vermilion-GX
attacks.text: You may attach up to 5 Fire Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Altaria-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Bright Tone
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX.

attacks.name: Sonic Edge
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Euphoria-GX
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep. Heal all damage from all of your Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Salamence-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Dragon Lift
abilities.text: Your Pokémon in play have no Retreat Cost, except Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX.

attacks.name: Bright Flame
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flame Jet-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: White Kyurem-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Shred
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Raging Blade
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Dragon Nova-GX
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned and Paralyzed. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Ultra Necrozma-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Photon Geyser
attacks.text: Discard all basic Psychic Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 80 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Sky-Scorching Light-GX
attacks.text: You can use this attack only if the total of both players' remaining Prize cards is 6 or less. Put 6 damage counters on each of your opponent's Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
